privacy: プライバシーポリシー

consentModal.label: クッキー
consentModal.title: このサイトではクッキーを使用しています
consentModal.description: Intake24では、ウェブサイトを適切に機能させるために必須のクッキーを使用しています。さらに、分析・統計目的のクッキーを通じて、訪問者の利用状況を把握し、サービスの向上に役立てています。
consentModal.acceptAllBtn: すべてのクッキーを承認
consentModal.showPreferencesBtn: クッキーの設定を確認・変更

sections.title: How we use cookies 📢
sections.description: Intake24 uses necessary cookies for the proper functioning of the website. Analytics & statistical cookies help us to understand how visitors use the websites to improve the services offered.

sections.title: Necessary cookies Always Enabled
sections.description: Cookies that are strictly necessary for the proper functioning of the website.

body.name: it24_cc_consent
body.desc: Cookies consent preferences used by the website.

sections.title: Analytics and statistical cookies
sections.description: Analytics and statistical cookies help us to understand how visitors use the websites to improve the services offered. Information is collected and stored anonymously.

body.name: ^_ga
body.desc: Unique ID that is used to create statistical data about how visitors use the websites.

body.name: ^_gid
body.desc: Unique ID that is used to create statistical data about how visitors use the websites.

sections.title: More information
sections.description: If you have any questions, please contact us.
